summary: [WIP] SynthLab (Laboratory of Synthesis) is major update for Atronach Forge in Winterhold College and Spider Crafting Station on Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Overview[/b]

SynthLab (Laboratory of Synthesis) is major update for [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Atronach_Forge]Atronach Forge[/url] and [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Imbuing_Chamber]Imbuing Chamber[/url].

For testing the new recipes go to Midden 'WinterholdCollegeMidden01' or to the special testing cell (`)

[code]coc synthtest[/code]

[img=100x50] http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/51672-1-1393805982.jpg [/img]

This mod has the following objectives:

- Creating a universal crafting station, which can replace most of the traditional like: Cooking Pot, Alchemy Lab, Staff Enchanter, Oven, Smelter, Tanning Rack and I hope Arcane Enchanter.
- Transfer the old familiar recipes, and in the case of creating new, they must be logical, no more brooms, silver swords and other nonsense.

[b]What recipes are available now?[/b]

+Cooking Pot
+Oven
+Smelter
+Tanning Rack

[b]What will be added in the near future?[/b]

I almost finished potion recipes. To create potions needs 2 or 3 ingredients with the same effect and potion quality will depend of character level and mostly of the conjuration skill (is a topic for discussion). Also will be possible to put the ready potion and machine will turn it back into ingredients (reverse mode).
Now I'm stuck with writing a script.
[img=100x50] http://tesalliance.org/forums/public/style_emoticons/default/bb_oblivion.gif [/img]


Creation Kit 1.9.32, [url=http://www.sublimetext.com/3]Sublime Text 3[/url], [url=http://www.creationkit.com/Sublime_Text_Setup]Papyrus Plugin[/url], [url=http://www.sublimerge.com/]Sublimerge[/url]
author: Kai Kurokawa
